Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at O'Hare
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing O'Hare due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing O'Hare due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Shuttle buses are requested from O'Hare to Rosemont to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
